title: Bug 16822 - Search results not being removed when cu is moved
OB: Search results persist on the screen even after moving cu (current user).
EB: Search results should be removed from the display when cu is moved.
SR:
1. Log in to the system.
2. Perform a search for any item.
3. Move the cu to a different location.
4. Observe that the search results are still visible on the screen.
